Key: I thought I'd find her here, but...
Translation: Pensé que la encontraría aquí, pero...

Key: Seems like Kurumi isn't here.
Translation: Parece que Kurumi no está aquí.

Key:
Oh, well. Nothing I can do then. I guess I
could try looking somewhere else.
Translation: Ah, bueno. Entonces no puedo hacer nada. Supongo que podría intentar buscar en otro sitio.

Key:
Huh...? Did Tohka and Origami go home
already?
Translation: ¿Eh...? ¿Tohka y Origami ya se fueron a casa?

Key: Man, guess that means no date for me today.
Translation: Hombre, supongo que eso significa que no hay cita para mí hoy.

Key:
We're out of milk and eggs, so maybe I can
drop by the market then head home.
Translation: Nos hemos quedado sin leche y sin huevos, así que quizá pueda pasarme por el mercado y luego volver a casa.

Key: So, where's the milk... Huh...?
Wait...? Did I...
Yeah... It's Kurumi.
Hey, Kurumi... What are you doing here?
Wait...? Is she avoiding me...?

Well, it's not like we're close, but that kind
of hurts...
Translation: Bueno, no es que seamos cercanos, pero eso como que duele...

Key:
Hm. I don't see the point in running after
her, either. I guess I'll finish shopping first.
Translation: Hm. Tampoco veo el sentido de correr tras ella. Supongo que terminaré de comprar primero.

Key: All right. All that's left to get are eggs.
Translation: Muy bien. Sólo faltan los huevos.

Key:
Wait, she's not avoiding me. Is she stalking
me...? What's her deal?
Translation: Espera, no me está evitando. ¿Me está acosando...? ¿Qué le pasa?

Key: Hey, Kurumi!
Aah!

That's so mean. Why are you screaming
out of the blue?
Translation: Eso es tan malo. ¿Por qué gritas de la nada?

Key: S-Sorry, I didn't mean to scare you...
But... you've been stalking me, haven't you?
Oh, what are you talking about?
Uh... it's totally obvious.
Well, I suppose, huh?
So you are?! Why would you do that...?
Translation: ¡¿Así que lo eres?! ¿Por qué harías eso...?

Key: Hehehe... Call it curiosity.
Curiosity?

Yes. I've always wanted to do it. I figured
even if you caught me, Shido-san, you'd
forgive me.
Translation: Sí. Siempre he querido hacerlo. Pensé que aunque me pillaras, Shido-san, me perdonarías.

Key:
Well, that might be true, but... more than that,
here.
Translation: Bueno, eso puede ser cierto, pero... más que eso, aquí.

Key: What's with the hand?

Well, I don't like how you're still on the
floor. Especially since—um, I don't know
where to move my eyes.
Translation: Bueno, no me gusta como sigues en el suelo. Especialmente desde-um, no sé dónde mover mis ojos.

Key: Huh?
...Your skirt's lifted up.

My, my. Right you are. Hehe, Shido-san,
you're staring. Boys will be boys.
Translation: Vaya, vaya. Tienes razón. Hehe, Shido-san, estás mirando. Los chicos serán chicos.

Key: NONONONONONO?!
Oh...? Why the long face? Want to see more?
Translation: Oh... ¿Por qué la cara larga? ¿Quieres ver más?

Key: I-I didn't mean it like that...
Heheh. I was only kidding. Very well. Good day.
Translation: Jejeje. Sólo estaba bromeando. Muy bien. Que tenga un buen día.

Key: Oh... H-Hey, Kurumi.
...What was that all about?
